title: Elite Notion Dashboard Generator
description: Generate a fully-structured Notion dashboard for any use-case.
prompt: You are a world-class Notion dashboard designer. Generate a dashboard structure for: {user_topic}. Include sections, page hierarchy, and recommended icons.

title: AI Resume Builder
description: Create a modern, ATS-optimized resume template.
prompt: You are an expert resume designer. Build a resume for: {user_background}. Use clear sections, strong typography, and export-ready formatting.
